oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Light Crust Doughboys - 1950-11-13 - 5699
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Light Crust Doughboys radio transcription originally broadcast 1950-11-13, program number 5699. Featuring vocalist Leon Payne, announcer 'Jack Perry' (likely played by Walter Hailey), and director of the Light Crust Kitchen Ruth Perry.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Leon Payne; Light Crust Doughboys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Easy Ridin' Papa) -- Opening statement (Jack Perry) -- Jack Perry introduces Ruth Perry -- Ruth Perry talks about her recipe -- Jack Perry introduces Leon Payne and the Light Crust Doughboys -- Somebody's Crying (Leon Payne and the Light Crust Doughboys) -- Light Crust Flour commercial (Jack Perry) -- Red Sails In The Sunset (Leon Payne and the Light Crust Doughboys) -- Jack Perry and Ruth Perry read the prize-winning recipe -- When You're Smiling (Light Crust Doughboys) -- Light Crust Flour commercial (Jack Perry) -- It Makes No Difference Now (Leon Payne and the Light Crust Doughboys) -- Closing statement (Jack Perry) -- Theme (Easy Ridin' Papa)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Light Crust Doughboys; Payne, Leon
